Class jogl.JoglRenderer 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Thread
           |
           +----jogl.JoglRenderer
public abstract class JoglRenderer
extends Thread
JoglRenderer is a thread that repeatedly calls display after calling init(), once. To stop and start it use resume/suspend.

gl

JoglRenderer()
The constructor doesn't do anything the user needs to know about

display()
Put all your drawing routines in this method
init()
Put in this method all your init code, for instance, this is where you would set up lights, materials, textures etc.
run()
